channel.title: [517] Trading PkP - Need Guidance

item.title: [517] Trading PkP - Need Guidance
item.dc:creator: @ownerz12 ownerz12
item.description:
@ownerz12 wrote:

I’m trying to make it so players can trade PkPoints. I chose a item that resembles(or IS) a note, and I have correctly added the command buypkpnote: if (cmd[0].equals("buypkpnote")) { if (p.KC >= 10) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 691, 1); p.KC -= 10; } else { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You need 10 Pk Points to buy a PkP note."); }
Now I kinda need some help on selling the “PkPnote”.
So can anyone generate a code for me that could make the command sellpkpnote work and give the player 10 pkp?
All help is appreciated.

Read full topic
